column1: Frank, as always, admired his height, very tall.
But she had inherited her father's tall height, his lankiness.
Being tall did add more frustrations to their lives than perceived advantages.
Young warrior straightened to her full height, almost as tall as the warrior herself.
But I'm loving my height now cause tall girls do make a more lasting impression.
Girls have to be a certain height, not too tall, cute, young.
I was worried about my height and how tall I was going to be.
These folks were white and in height they were as tall as this ceiling.
Almost the same height since she was tall, which made it even more like they were together.
There's still the matter of height. How tall are you?
